tutorial.speak:
To manually add a new sermon, click the plus icon on the Sermons page and select "Add Sermon".
Select a Playlist, then enter the youtube video I.D. and click fetch.
The youtube video I.D. is the string of characters after the "v=" in the video's URL on YouTube.
When you click fetch, all of the video details will be imported automatically. This includes the date, duration, title, description, and thumbnail. Make any changes you wish and click save.
The video will be added to your sermons page.
It can also now be scheduled as a pre-recorded live stream from the stream settings page.
